Opcode.Message: Scenario start enables context providers to the WDI context logger.
Opcode.Name: WDI_SEM_TASK_SCENARIO_OPCODE_START

Opcode.Message: Scenario end disables context providers to the WDI context logger.
Opcode.Name: WDI_SEM_TASK_SCENARIO_OPCODE_END

Opcode.Message: When a scenario has remained in-flight beyond the maximum time window it is automatically terminated by the SEM.
Opcode.Name: WDI_SEM_TASK_SCENARIO_OPCODE_TIMEOUT

Opcode.Message: A scenario start attempt failed in the SEM.
Opcode.Name: WDI_SEM_TASK_SCENARIO_OPCODE_START_FAILED

Opcode.Message: A scenario end attempt failed in the SEM.
Opcode.Name: WDI_SEM_TASK_SCENARIO_OPCODE_END_FAILED

Opcode.Message: The SEM received a request to start a new scenario, but the maximum number of scenarios were already in-flight.
Opcode.Name: WDI_SEM_TASK_SCENARIO_OPCODE_INFLIGHT_MAX

Opcode.Message: There is an invalid configuration parameter in the SEM registry namespace.
Opcode.Name: WDI_SEM_TASK_INIT_OPCODE_MISCONFIG

Opcode.Message: The SEM is configured with more scenarios than the maximum allowed count.
Opcode.Name: WDI_SEM_TASK_INIT_OPCODE_SCENARIO_MAX

Opcode.Message: The SEM is configured with a scenario with too many context providers.
Opcode.Name: WDI_SEM_TASK_INIT_OPCODE_SCENARIO_CONTEXT_PROVIDER_MAX

Opcode.Message: The SEM is configured with a scenario that has too many end events.
Opcode.Name: WDI_SEM_TASK_INIT_OPCODE_SCENARIO_END_EVENT_MAX

Opcode.Message: The number of providers specified across all scenarios is above the maximum allowed amount.
Opcode.Name: WDI_SEM_TASK_INIT_OPCODE_PROVIDER_MAX

Event.Opcode: Scenario start enables context providers to the WDI context logger.
Event.Message: The Scenario Event Mapper started a scenario for provider %1 (event ID %2) with %4 context providers. The context logger dropped event count was %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProviderID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="EventID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="DroppedEventCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ActionCount" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <struct name="SemActions" count="ActionCount"> <data name="ProviderID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Level" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="Reserved" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte" count="7"/> <data name="Keyword" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="EnableProperty" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NTStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </struct> </template>

Event.Opcode: Scenario end disables context providers to the WDI context logger.
Event.Message: The Scenario Event Mapper stopped a scenario for provider %1 (event ID %2) with %4 context providers. The context logger dropped event count was %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProviderID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="EventID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="DroppedEventCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ActionCount" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <struct name="SemActions" count="ActionCount"> <data name="ProviderID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Level" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="Reserved" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte" count="7"/> <data name="Keyword" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="EnableProperty" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NTStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </struct> </template>

Event.Opcode: When a scenario has remained in-flight beyond the maximum time window it is automatically terminated by the SEM.
Event.Message: An in-flight scenario from provider %1 (event ID %2) timed out and was stopped automatically by the Scenario Event Mapper.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProviderID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="EventID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: The SEM received a request to start a new scenario, but the maximum number of scenarios were already in-flight.
Event.Message: The Scenario Event Mapper was unable to start a new scenario for provider %1 (event ID %2) because the maximum number of scenarios are already in flight.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProviderID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="EventID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ScenarioCount" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <struct name="ScenarioInflightItems" count="ScenarioCount"> <data name="ProviderID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="EventID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Reserved" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="InflightCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </struct> </template>

Event.Opcode: A scenario start attempt failed in the SEM.
Event.Message: The Scenario Event Mapper was unable to start a scenario for provider %1 (event ID %2). The error code was %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProviderID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="EventID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="NTStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: A scenario end attempt failed in the SEM.
Event.Message: The Scenario Event Mapper was unable to stop a scenario for provider %1 (event ID %2). The error code was %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProviderID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="EventID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="NTStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: The SEM is configured with more scenarios than the maximum allowed count.
Event.Message: The Scenario Event Mapper is configured with more than the maximum number of scenarios. The scenario for provider %1 (event ID %2) will be ignored.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProviderID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="EventID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: The SEM is configured with a scenario with too many context providers.
Event.Message: The Scenario Event Mapper is configured with more than the maximum number of context providers for the scenario with provider %1 (event ID %2). The scenario will be ignored.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProviderID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="EventID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: The SEM is configured with a scenario that has too many end events.
Event.Message: The Scenario Event Mapper is configured with more than the maximum number of end events for the scenario with provider %1 (event ID %2). The scenario will be ignored.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProviderID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="EventID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: The number of providers specified across all scenarios is above the maximum allowed amount.
Event.Message: The Scenario Event Mapper is configured with more than the maximum number of providers. The provider %1 will be ignored.

Event.Opcode: There is an invalid configuration parameter in the SEM registry namespace.
Event.Message: The Scenario Event Mapper is configured with an unsupported scenario. The scenario for provider %1 (event ID %2) encountered error code %3 and will be ignored.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProviderID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="EventID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="NTStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SqmType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmSid" inType="win:SID" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SqmSessionGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="SqmID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmDWORDDatapointValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SqmSessionGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="SqmID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmStreamRowLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="SqmStreamRow" count="SqmStreamRowLength"> <data name="SqmTypeEntry" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmDWORDEntry" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmStringEntry" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </struct> </template>
